mapper.select: SELECT id ,title ,review ,address ,rating ,lat ,lng ,visit_dt as visitDt ,regist_id as registId ,regist_dt as registDt ,attach_file_master_id as attachFileMasterId ,(select attach_file_id from attach_file where tb.attach_file_master_id = attach_file_master_id limit 1) as attachFileId FROM map_review tb

SELECT id ,title ,review ,address ,rating ,lat ,lng ,visit_dt as visitDt ,regist_id as registId ,regist_dt as registDt ,attach_file_master_id as attachFileMasterId ,(select attach_file_id from attach_file where tb.attach_file_master_id = attach_file_master_id limit 1) as attachFileId FROM map_review tb WHERE lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng}
